tags.description:en: The museum was built in memory of the ancestors of the current inhabitants of Romanian nationality in Salonta that came from Beius area in 1927, mostly from settlements like Ferice, Budureasa, Campani si Rosia. The small museum includes a traditional w...

tags.name: Muzeul taranului Roman Salonta
